title: LOTR: The Battle For Middle Earth maps
description:
LOTR: The Battle For Middle Earth maps for version 1.02 or above.

all you have to do is:

firstly download the torrent, THEN SEED

Map Installation
__________________

1. Open the directory:

C:\Documents and Settings\#\Application Data\My Battle for Middle-earth Files\Maps

# = your account&#039;s username

2. Extact this map&#039;s folder to that directory

 Map Usage
___________

1. Run Battle for Middle Earth

2. Click &#039;Solo Play&#039; and then &#039;Skirmish&#039; from the menus

3. Click &#039;Player Made Maps&#039; in the Map Type combobox

4. Choose starting points, sides, colours etc

5. Click &#039;Start Game&#039;


if you dont SEED you may as well not download
